qa_pair.question: What is the maximum file size limit for uploading to Gemini File Search stores?
What is the default embedding model used by Gemini File Search for indexing?
How long do temporary File objects persist before automatic deletion when using uploadToFileSearchStore?
What is the pricing per million tokens for embeddings at indexing time in File Search?
What two Gemini models support the File Search tool?
What is the recommended maximum size per FileSearchStore to ensure optimal retrieval latencies?
What parameter controls the maximum number of tokens per chunk in chunking configuration?
Are query-time embeddings charged or free of charge in File Search?
What is the total storage limit for file search stores on the Free tier?
What technique does File Search use to find information relevant to user prompts?
